file.name: invalid-refs.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Swagger Petstore
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /pet/findByStatus:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: automatically documented through Optic
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: number
                    category:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/Category'
                    user:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/User' # doesn't exist yet
                    name:
                      type: string
                    photoUrls:
                      type: array
                      items:
                        type: string
                    tags:
                      type: array
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: number
                          name:
                            type: string
                        required:
                          - id
                          - name
                    status:
                      type: string
                  required:
                    - id
                    - photoUrls
                    - tags
                    - status
servers:
  - url: http://petstore.swagger.io/v2
  - url: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2
components:
  schemas:
    Category:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: number
        name:
          type: string
      required:
        - id

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/pet/findByStatus": at 1:240: get: at 1:247: responses: 200: at 1:267: content: application/json: at 1:298: schema: at 1:308: parse schema: item: at 1:317: parse schema: property "user": at 1:659: parse schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/User": find schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/User": can't find value for "components/schemas/User"
